com

Class Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • kdu_jni.Kdu_compressed_source
      • kdu_jni.Kdu_cache
        • com.Cache
          • com.Reader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Reader
extends Cache
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Reader is responsible for managing the JPIP communications over HTTP. It is currently implemented to manage a stateless HTTP connection.
    Since:
    14/02/2013
    Author:
    Dylan McCarthy
